content.text:
# King's County & Ormonde Tournament

The King’s County & Ormonde Tournament  also later known as the Midland Counties Championships Ireland was an early men's tennis tournament held in Parsonstown, King’s County, Ireland from 1883 through 1896.
History
The King’s County and Ormonde Tournament was a brief pre-open era tennis tournament played on outdoor grass courts in Parsonstown, King’s County, Ireland there were nine editions of this event.
Past tournaments
Incomplete list of tournaments included:
